Bookmarklet to make your browser a Text Editor

May 26, 2015

It is a link/bookmarklet that opens a browser window/tab with a big content-editable region so you can start typing some notes, thoughts, ideas, quotesâ€¦ you get it.

Open my browser as a Text Editor

Here is where it started, as far as I know LINK. If you read the comments you can find a bunch of variations. Some that will save your typing to localStorage so closing the window does not loose your stuff.

Here is the code in the link I pasted above.

data:text/html;charset=utf-8,%20<title>TextEditor</title><body%20contenteditable%20style="font-size:2rem;font-family:monaco;line-height:1.4;max-width:60rem;margin:0%20auto;padding:4rem;"%20spellcheck="false"><h1>Text%20Editor</h1><p>Start%20Here.
